title: LOL Client is very laggy
body: I tried to play a match and I couldn't ban a champion because the timer was stuck at 0 thus having to wait 5 minutes before queuing again. My internet connection was working fine as I was able to chat with my team members. Also I noticed that the client is using a lot of memory ~500mb across 4 different processes.

replies.body: That means your connection with our servers went dormant. The internet works in a way that you can access some servers but not be able to contact some others depending on how your connection is being routed by your ISP. Double check your network settings, specifically Port Forwarding and DNS, by following those steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if that gives your network an easier time getting through.
